name: easypanel
features: Application deployment: Deploy Docker containers and applications through a visual interface without command-line complexity.
Server management: Monitor resource usage, manage services, and control server settings from a unified dashboard.
One-click apps: Install popular applications like databases, CMS platforms, and tools with pre-configured templates.
Domain configuration: Set up custom domains, SSL certificates, and reverse proxy rules through the web interface.
Database management: Create and manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Redis instances with automatic backups and monitoring.
Team collaboration: Share server access with team members using role-based permissions for controlled management.
Automated backups: Schedule regular backups of applications and databases with easy restoration options.
Resource monitoring: Track CPU, memory, disk, and network usage across all deployed applications in real-time.
